alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN ORANGE COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 426 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from Phillipsport to Paupack. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cuddebackville around 435 PM EDT. Howells and Otisville around 440 PM EDT. Walden and Huguenot around 445 PM EDT. Port Jervis and Montgomery around 450 PM EDT. Middletown around 455 PM EDT. Gardnertown around 500 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern New York.
